pages.text: The mesmerizing witches orb is many witches first steps into crafting a magical offhand bauble. Simple to craft, they offer a single powerful modifier that augments your scepter spells the same as any modifiers directly affixed to the scepter itself. Great for early-mid game augmentation of your spellcasting, it is recommended to upgrade to the much more involved $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/spellcasters_focus)Spellcasters Focus$() once you have more resources.

pages.title: Aspect Modifiers
pages.text: When crafting the orb, pick the center aspect gem carefully! Each one imbues the orb with a different Scepter Modifier. In some cases, the modifier is unique to the orb and can't be obtained any other way. See the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_upgrading/aspect_gems)aspect gems$() entry for details.
